title: Blue Spark Shock Mount with Pop Filter, Windscreen and Shockmount to Reduce Vibration Noise Matching Mic Boom Arm for Blue Spark SL Microphone by YOUSHARES
features: Professional Design - Designed for Blue Spark SL Large-Diaphragm Condenser Microphone to reduce vibration, save your audio editing time.
Perfect Shockmount - Shock Mount isolates the mic from noise, shocks and vibrations. Like floor tapping, desk bumping, putting down the drink, rolling your chair.
Capability - It fit the most of boom arm/ mic stand (Fit 3/8"and 5/8). The shockmount is made of ABS hard plastic.
Perfect Filter - Blue Spark Pop Filter (Windscreen) makes it more transparent to muffles higher frequencies pop noise. Blocks out plosives, pop, breath and wind noise.
Kindly Reminder - This product does not include Blue Spark microphone. Only have 1 X Blue Blue Spark Shock mount (With Windscreen).
description: Are you still bothered by the obnoxious noise, shock and vibrations, like floor tapping, desk bumping, putting down a glass of liquor, adjusting the boom arm during recording, etc.?
You definitely need a Blue Spark Mic Shock Mount

Choose YOUSHRES’s shock mount, take your recording and streaming to the Next Level. Our shock mount are designed for Blue Spark to effectively isolate the microphone from the noise and vibration. This Blue Spark shock comes with a Foam insert, which is used to hold and protect the microphone.
It reduces rumble noise in your recordings dramatically. Improve recording quality, reduce post-production time.
The hinge is a locking type that attaches to the stand solidly. With adapter to works with both US and Euro microphone stands(3/8"", 5/8"" threads).

Mic windscreen will improve your sound quality of audio projects & perfect show your vocal life. Microphone pop filter make sure your vioce loud and clear, banish the dreaded hissing and lisping sounds that come when pronouncing the letter ""s"" and the explosion of air that follows ""b"" and ""p"".
1 x Blue Spark Shock Mount with Wind Screen
Blue Spark SL Large-Diaphragm Condenser Microphone Not Included.
